manavx81 wrote:
> Hi all,
> 
> I get errors when I add new Url's to the seed, while the job is
> running. I get 'Domain Unresolved' and 'Out of scope' error on two
> differnt urls respectively. But when I start a new job with all the
> above urls, I don't have any problems.
> 
> Anyone hit this issue.

Manav -

How exactly are you adding the mid-crawl seeds? Via the web UI, or some 
other way?

Some Scopes use the seeds to configure themselves. Such Scopes are 
supposed to update their configuration when new seeds are added 
mid-crawl, but it's possible something about your process is causing 
this necessary step to be skipped or fail. That might cause the URL 
errors you're seeing.

- Gordon @ IA
